text: 2.2 2 Ko 1.6, Epe 3.4, 3.18, Plp 3.8, Kol 1.26, 3.14 Nɨbi mɨdupsek gos sek mɨdɨl, penpen mapen lɨl jɨmñɨl yenɨmɨb agɨl, nɨbop nen wog kɨles gɨpin. Anɨgem, gos tep nɨŋɨd nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb ak nɨm, God gos ne we gɨl yolɨgup ak nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabɨm. Pen gos ne we gɨl yolɨgup anɨb ak nɨm, Klays nop ak nep.
